attributes.action: Surrey should succeed from the Union
attributes.additional_details:
Surrey is a very rich county, but we give all our money to central government in business rates, income tax and VAT and hardly get anything back for local services such as the NHS and the roads.

It is about time that Surrey succeeded from the Union and went its own way. With all the tax money we could be the nicest place to live in the world.

Quite happy for the Independent Sovereign Nation of Surrey to stay in the United Kingdom Currency Zone, like Jersey, Scotland etc. and in the European Union.
